params.name: image_processor
params.description: The AriaImageProcessor to use for image preprocessing.

params.name: tokenizer
params.description: An instance of PreTrainedTokenizerBase. This should correspond with the models text model. The tokenizer is a required input.

params.name: chat_template
params.description: A Jinja template which will be used to convert lists of messages in a chat into a tokenizable string.

params.name: size_conversion
params.description: A dictionary indicating size conversions for images.
